welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Chinchina! Known for its coffee production and beautiful landscapes, we invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santaguida Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Santaguida Airport is responsible for handling all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights within Colombia.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights to and from Colombia.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cartago Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Cartago Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
